bug.author: nsankar
bug.description:
FAISSDocumentStore() in the tutorial shows elastic search output in the DPR tutorial <denchmark-link:https://github.com/deepset-ai/haystack/blob/master/tutorials/Tutorial6_Better_Retrieval_via_DPR.ipynb>https://github.com/deepset-ai/haystack/blob/master/tutorials/Tutorial6_Better_Retrieval_via_DPR.ipynb</denchmark-link>
Please refer to the screenshot below. <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/431890/90524992-5d95f080-e18c-11ea-9e8e-202de024ec7b.png></denchmark-link>
Expected behavior A clear and concise description of what you expected to happen. Additional context Add any other context about the problem here, like document types / preprocessing steps / settings of reader etc. To Reproduce Steps to reproduce the behavior System:
OS: GPU/CPU: Haystack version (commit or version number): DocumentStore: Reader: Retriever:

comments.comment: Thanks for reporting <denchmark-link:https://github.com/nsankar>@nsankar</denchmark-link> ! We have fixed this in <denchmark-link:https://github.com/deepset-ai/haystack/pull/308>#308</denchmark-link>
